name: Thermotech Engineering (Pune) Pvt Ltd
overview:
Manufacturing and supply of various process equipments like reactors, agitators, special equipments with mass transfer & heat transfer design and shell & tube heat exchangers.

We introduce ourselves as a leading organization in the field of Design & Manufacturing of various process equipments like Agitators, Mixers, Reactors and Heat exchangers, etc

We are the team of technocrats having in truth good know-how in process equipments since last 15 years. We focus on optimum design of agitators for blending, heat transfer, mass transfer, solid suspension, uniform mixing etc, and we have manufactured more than 3000 agitators.
